CustomField.description: Patient journey milestone for Status = Pending
CustomField.formula: CASE(PJN_New_Therapy_Status__c, "Pending", CASE(PJN_New_Therapy_Sub_Status__c, "New Referral","PE", "Missing Information, Patient Outreach","PE", "Missing Information, HCP Outreach","PE", "Missing Information, RBM Outreach","PE", "Prescriber Welcome Call Attempted","PE", "Prescriber Welcome Call Completed","PE", "Patient Welcome Call Attempted","PE", "Patient Welcome Call Completed","PE", "Copay Card Enrolled","PE", "Copay Card Not Eligible","PE", "Transfer to SP CTTP","FR", "Benefits Investigation Start","BI", "Benefits Investigation Completed","TR", "Access Plan Pending Confirmation","TR", "Access Plan Confirmed","TR", "Transfer to HCP B&B","TR", "Transfer to SP Commercial","TR", "Transfer to SP PAP","TR", "Prior Authorization Support Start","PA", "Prior Authorization Approved","PA", "Prior Authorization Denied","PA", "Appeal Support (1st Level)","PA", "Appeal Support (2nd Level)","PA", "Appeal Support (3rd Level)","PA", "Appeal Support (Peer-to-Peer)","PA", "Appeal Approved","PA", "Appeal Denied","PA", "PA/Appeal Support Max Attempts","PA", "SD Order Confirmed (verbal)","FR", "SD Order Confirmed (data)","FR", "SP Shipment Confirmed","FR", "Site of Care Delayed","FR", "Site of Care Changed","FR", "Site of Care Cancelled","FR", "Site of Care Ready","FR", "Benefit Investigation COB","BI", "Prior Authorization Support Queued","PA", "Prior Authorization Support Unnecessary","PA", "Pending Onboarding","FR", "Hospital Pharmacy Review","TR", "On Hold Medical Delay", "", "On Hold Step Therapy Required", "", "On Hold Patient Travel", "", "On Hold Genetic Testing", "", "On Hold Prescriber Change", "", null), null)
CustomField.label: Milestone - Pending
